oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:title: Postcard set depicting World War I soldier life
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:description: This folding postcard set of 24 cards depicting World War, 1914-1918 soldier life was written on by Dennis Edward Kearney and sent to Anna Cresswell, his then-girlfriend and later wife, in Memphis, Tennessee. Signed "Just Me" or "JM", his typical signature to her. Sent while in Btry. B, 115th FA, 30th Div., Camp Sevier, Greenville, SC. Dennis and Anna married right after he returned from war, May 3, 1919.
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:subject: World War, 1914-1918; World War, 1914-1918 - History
